entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Bad performance in CSharpRemoveUnnecessaryImportsDiagnosticAnalyzer with System.Text.Json source generator #74761
  • IDE0130 warning "Namespace 'Foo.Bar' does not match folder structure, expected 'Foo_xyz_wpftmp.Bar'" when EnforceCodeStyleInBuild is enabled #74758
  • Add `IMethodSymbol Deconstruct` to `IDeconstructionAssignmentOperation` #74757
  • Go To Definition stops working #74756

Closed

  • IDE0100 triggers on `boolVariable is false` or `boolVariable is true` #74755
  • Collection expressions use `AddRange` instead of manual `foreach` in presence of a struct enumerator #74615
    Backlog
  • Building twice in VS is broken. #74314
  • Generator vs xaml generated files (the "*.g.i.cs") #74685
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35213.67 #74754

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove net35 reference assemblies #74763
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Do not run 'remove unnecessary imports' on generated code #74762
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • 17.10: Cherry-pick fix for scenario where lightbulbs weren't being displayed #74760
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Remove nonexistent folders from the solution explorer #74759
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Use manual `foreach` instead of `AddRange` method for certain collection expression spreads #74630
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Cleanup LSP error reporting #74530
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove unnecessary CODE_STYLE workarounds #74697
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Add support in DevKit for source link go to definition #74626
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Refactor semantic snippets #74712
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Use existing property to access services #74749
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Disable build on test refresh #74751
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Reduce allocations from newline information allocated by ChangedText.GetLinesCore #74728
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add option for LSP based auto-insert #74485
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Report field diagnostic as warning, only report when ambiguous, and only with preview language version #74729
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Expose document symbols to Razor cohosting #74730
    VSCode
  • Use single argument overload for `[start..]` of `string` or `(ReadOnly)Span` #74643
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Make semantic APIs return more consistent results for `new T()` expressions #74675
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Fix nested nullability of collection expressions #74490
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Rename Tools/Options inline hint settings #71855
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Needs UX Triage
  • Add file watchers for analyzer references #74745
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix leading comments not being preserved on variable case #74278
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Update LSP Protocol Types #73911
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, VSCode
